function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data on spatiotemporal attributes such as patients' tracking data, residents' activity data, passengers' travel data of buses and subways, and mobile location data","Impact":"Inability to establish a comprehensive understanding of disease transmission and propagation dynamics","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative data sources and leveraging advanced tracking technologies","Technologies":"Advanced tracking technologies, data analytics, and artificial intelligence","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in obtaining data in a public health safety emergency, which usually features missing or incomplete coverage","Impact":"Limited ability to accurately assess the spread and impact of the disease","Mitigation":"Prioritizing data collection and coordination among relevant authorities","Technologies":"Data collection tools, data sharing platforms, and coordination technologies","People":"Health authorities, government agencies, data collection organizations","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Focus on a generalized model without simulation for the fine-grained location of patients","Impact":"Limitation in understanding and predicting localized disease clusters and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Integrating localized simulation data and refining the model for micro-level analysis","Technologies":"Simulation technologies, geospatial data analysis, and machine learning","People":"Researchers, public health agencies","Owner":"Researchers, public health agencies"}]}
